Overflowing with underwater footage of whales, dolphins, tropical fish, and more, Neptune's Oceans invites you and your baby on an oceanic voyage of discovery!

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Dignity - EP117
programme.desc: In this episode we will discover the value of dignity, finding that it goes hand in hand with self-love and self-esteem. We must value ourselves and respect ourselves first and then others. Being respectful is a rule to be able to live in harmony and dignity. It takes dignity to ask for forgiveness and to forgive!

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Degraded Grassland - EP203
programme.desc: Gisele and her Green Team fight to stop Nick Slick from operating an illegal cattle ranch and draining all of the Earth's resources.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - The Lost Puppy / Goats in Trees - EP214
programme.desc: The Rangers save a lost puppy that is stuck in a city sewer system; Priscilla removes pesky seed-spitting tree goats from her orchard.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Dancing Machine / Ape Escape - EP115
programme.desc: Hoping to get on a dance show, Von Bolt wears a remote-control dance outfit! programme.desc: A Scottish bed and breakfast is supposedly haunted and plans to close down until the SMC kids figure out a plan to turn spooky, bad publicity into good publicity.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - The Paris Affair - EP122

programme.title: Shaq's Garage - The Great Race - EP110
programme.desc: Klaus's claim of being the fastest car int he world is put to the test.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - In the End, Part 2 - EP4
programme.desc: The story takes place in the distant future and focuses on a boy named Yuma Tsukumo, the number one bad boy at his school. Something unexpected happens when Ryoga challenges him to a Duel as the mysterious ghost of Astral appears before them, a new legend begins.

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep5 - EP5
programme.desc: Eight kid gamers, ages eight to twelve, battle it out in ten different Roblox games to win prizes and find out who is the ultimate gamer! Video gamer, football star, and children’s book author Rashad Jennings hosts!

programme.title: Baby Einstein - On the Go: Riding, Sailing and Soaring
programme.desc: As little ones become increasingly mobile, their fascination with all things that move intensifies too. On the Go Riding Sailing and Soaring exposes babies to the different ways people travel -- on land, by sea, and in the air -- while it presents them with captivating real-world images, funny puppet shows, and beautiful classical music by Beethoven, Haydn, Mozart and Rossini.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Confidence, Honesty, and Integrity - EP118
programme.desc: In this episode, we will discover the values of confidence, honesty and integrity. We will learn that we build trust by fulfilling the promises we make to others. Honesty means telling the truth, which also shows respect for others. We will understand that having integrity means that in addition to being honest, we also choose to do what is right.

programme.title: Mellodees - Wheels On The Bus - EP5
programme.desc: Dee rides the school bus on his way to class. Is that Marshmello driving the bus?

programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Confidence, Honesty, and Integrity - EP118

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. Many things can happen in Misha’s world; especially exciting adventures, mysterious investigations, hilarious competitions... all with a feeling of close friendship.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.
